mapper.sql: pack_id, store_id, pack_title, update_user, create_time, delivery_time, update_time, status, type, batch_id, is_material
mapper.update:
UPDATE general_package
store_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pack_title = #{packTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
delivery_time = #{deliveryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT},
batch_id = #{batchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_material = #{isMaterial,jdbcType=TINYINT},
products = #{products,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
WHERE pack_id = #{packId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
